channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report E-2023090458
item.description:
Report E-2023090458

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that 2 of the 50 pound bags of ammonium chloride (un3260) had been punctured by a sharp object and had released 60 pounds of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report I-2023080028
item.description:
Report I-2023080028

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKER DISCOVERE AND EMPLOYEE CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED AFFECTED PACKAGE OPENED ON THE FLOOR. THERE WERE 2 RED CYLINDER FIRE EXTINGUISHERS INSIDE. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE WAS NOT MARKED AS A HAZMAT. RESPONDER CLEANED AND BROUGHT THE PACKAGE BACK TO BE PROCESSED. RESPONDER TALKED TO THE HAZMAT AUDITOR AND CONTACTED ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report I-2023090016
item.description:
Report I-2023090016

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: Portland
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DELTA AIR LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Delta received notification on 07/24/23 of an undeclared event where lithium-ion batteries inside cell phones in freight marked "Apparel" on the air waybill. The cell phones were discovered during screening and not accepted/transported. Flight#: DL1021 Date: 07/24/2023 AWB: 006-76029693 The event is under investigation to determine root cause and subsequent corrective actions. See the attached pictures.
